promptPrefix:
Your task is to create a google optimized meta description from the text I give you. The meta description should be 120 characters or fewer including spaces. You should use as much of the 120 characters as possible. Use active voice. All output shall be in [TARGETLANGUAGE]. Use the tag "Meta Description:" The text I want you to create a meta description for is this:

[PROMPT]
title: BDX Meta Description
